title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.49 - Diplomas for university degrees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.49 - Diplomas for university degrees

State Regulations

The conferring of any degree by the Regents shall be
certified by a parchment under seal bearing the signatures of the chancellor
and the president. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.49

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
